Name: Sanctum of Verdant Growth
Story Background: The Sanctum of Verdant Growth is a place of primeval power, where the energies of nature are at their most potent. It is a nexus of lush abundance, where the cycle of life and renewal is celebrated and nurtured, providing sustenance to all who enter.
Ability: Sanctum of Verdant Growth enters the battlefield untapped and adds one green mana to your mana pool. You may tap Sanctum of Verdant Growth and pay 2 mana to search your library for a basic Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Appearance Description: Sanctum of Verdant Growth depicts a sprawling, verdant expanse adorned with towering trees, vibrant flora, and teeming wildlife. The land emanates a vibrant, emerald aura, exuding a sense of untamed natural majesty and boundless vitality.
